birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国湖北省汉口市

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省佛山市三水区
death_place.en: Sanshui District, Foshan, Guangdong, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆男演员，因外形酷似毛泽东而成为著名的特型演员，在84部影视作品中扮演毛泽东。
description.en: A mainland Chinese actor, famous as a look-alike actor for portraying Mao Zedong in 84 film and television productions.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军昆明军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军昆明军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国西南部设立的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army in southwestern China.

description.zh-cn: 一幅描绘青年毛泽东的著名油画，在文化大革命期间广为流传。
description.en: A famous oil painting depicting a young Mao Zedong, which was widely distributed during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国文化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的负责文化事务的部门，后重组为文化和旅游部。
description.en: A former ministry under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for cultural affairs, later reorganized into the Ministry of Culture and Tourism.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军负责军队政治工作的最高领导机关，后重组为中央军事委员会政治工作部。
description.en: The former highest leading organ for political work in the People's Liberation Army, later reorganized into the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国剧作家，曾任解放军艺术学院院长。
description.en: A Chinese playwright who once served as the president of the PLA Academy of Art.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人。
description.en: A founding marshal of the People's Republic of China and a leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国唯一的军队电影制片厂。
description.en: The only military film studio in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 演员古月的妻子。
description.en: Wife of actor Gu Yue.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的直辖市，现为武汉市的一部分。
description.en: A former municipality during the Republic of China era, now part of the city of Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 古月出生于中华民国时期的湖北省汉口市。
description.en: Gu Yue was born in Hankou, Hubei, during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，中国人民解放军解放桂林时，胡诗学参军并开始军旅文艺工作者生涯。
description.en: In 1949, when the People's Liberation Army liberated Guilin, Hu Shixue joined the army and began his career as a military literary and art worker.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军昆明军区

position.en: Cultural Officer, Head of Culture Section

description.zh-cn: 古月曾在中国人民解放军昆明军区担任文化干事，后升任文化科科长（正团职）。
description.en: Gu Yue served as a cultural officer in the Kunming Military Region of the PLA and was later promoted to Head of the Culture Section (regimental level).

description.zh-cn: 古月在文化大革命期间被发现其相貌与油画《毛主席去安源》中的毛泽东极为相似，这成为他日后被选为特型演员的契机。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Gu Yue was discovered to bear a strong resemblance to Mao Zedong in the oil painting 'Chairman Mao Goes to Anyuan', which became the catalyst for his selection as a look-alike actor.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国文化部

description.zh-cn: 1978年，中华人民共和国文化部和中国人民解放军总政治部联合开展特型演员的选拔工作，最终选中了古月扮演毛泽东。
description.en: In 1978, the Ministry of Culture and the PLA's General Political Department jointly launched a selection process for look-alike actors, ultimately choosing Gu Yue to portray Mao Zedong.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 1978年，中国人民解放军总政治部和中华人民共和国文化部联合开展特型演员的选拔工作，最终选中了古月扮演毛泽东。
description.en: In 1978, the PLA's General Political Department and the Ministry of Culture jointly launched a selection process for look-alike actors, ultimately choosing Gu Yue to portray Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 时任解放军艺术学院院长胡可发现了外貌酷似毛泽东的古月，并坚持考察，促成了其成为特型演员。
description.en: Hu Ke, then president of the PLA Academy of Art, discovered Gu Yue's resemblance to Mao Zedong and insisted on evaluating him, which led to him becoming a look-alike actor.

description.zh-cn: 在对比十余名候选人的定妆照后，叶剑英元帅亲自将古月圈定为饰演毛泽东的特型演员。
description.en: After comparing the makeup photos of more than ten candidates, Marshal Ye Jianying personally selected Gu Yue as the look-alike actor to portray Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 被选为特型演员后，古月随即被调到八一电影制片厂。
description.en: After being selected as a look-alike actor, Gu Yue was immediately transferred to the August First Film Studio.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，时任中央军委副主席的杨尚昆嘱咐古月在生活中“也要像毛泽东”。
description.en: In 1983, Yang Shangkun, then Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, advised Gu Yue to 'be like Mao Zedong' in his daily life as well.

description.zh-cn: 古月因外貌酷似毛泽东而被选为特型演员，其整个演艺生涯都围绕着扮演毛泽东展开。
description.en: Gu Yue was chosen as a look-alike actor due to his resemblance to Mao Zedong, and his entire acting career was centered around portraying him.

description.zh-cn: 张燕是古月的妻子。
description.en: Zhang Yan was Gu Yue's wife.
